CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Suzuki coupling reaction of the dibromide 2a,b with 3-thienylboronic acid gave 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione ( 3a,b ).

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 3-thienylboronic acid |
| 3,4-bis(3-thienyl)pyrrole-2,5-dione |

The entities "dibromide 2a,b" do not clearly refer to a material name, and therefore, they are not included in the table.

The entity "3-thienylboronic acid" is a material property because it is a chemical compound that can exhibit certain properties, such as reactivity or solubility, which are relevant to its potential applications.
